response.overview: Phoebe is an obedient Catholic looking to open her mind and explore new sides of herself. After matching with Ron and Vera, a charming couple on a dating app, they invite her over for a drink, to listen to some tunes, and perhaps examine their own relationship boundaries. Upon entry to the house, they lay down the charm, treating Phoebe as if she is God's gift from heaven. But what starts off as an exciting evening, full of mystery and possibility, slowly unravels into a nightmare when the couple's 8-year-old son walks in on them, demanding something to eat. Unfortunately for Phoebe, Ron and Vera are the type who will do anything to satiate their child's needs.
response.title: Open Wide
